title: Flat available - Marygrove area
posting_body: Upper floor of a duplex, 2 BR, 1 BA.
$600 (utilities included) for single room or $1000 for the whole flat (utilities not included).
WiFi included, and room can be available either furnished or unfurnished, lease duration is negotiable also.
Downstairs neighbors are super nice and quiet.
If you’re interested, please respond with a little about yourself, like interests/occupation/etc, and we can set up a time for you to come check the place out!
